Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Ignore baseimage and thirdparty image release jobs

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Why is this a Bug? It's a Task.

Action.author: jtclark
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu and I verified that the release jobs are ready for 1.2. We also identified modifications that need to be made for both the fabric and fabric-ca release jobs so that they are compatible with releasing images for the 1.0 branch/tag.
